question: Will Kyrie Irving play in an NBA game by October 31?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kyrie Irving enters for at least a second in any NBA game up to and including the Nets matchup against the Pistons on October 31, 2021, at 7:30 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” Being on the bench will not count as playing.

question: Will Ben Simmons play in the 76ers’ season opener?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ben Simmons enters for at least a second against the Pelicans on October 20, 2021, and “No” otherwise. If Simmons is on the roster but does not leave the bench, this market will resolve to “No.”

question: Will the Packers beat the Bears by more than 4.5 points in their week six matchup?
description: This game is scheduled for October 17, 2021, at 1:00 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Packers win by over 4.5 points. If the Bears lose by less than 4.5 points or win, it will resolve to “No.” If the match is postponed to a date on or before November 17, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after November 17, 2021, or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Tether lose its peg by November 30, 2021?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” If Tether (USDT) falls below $0.90 within the market time frame and for a period greater than 1 continuous hour. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” The market time frame spans from October 14, 2021 12:00 PM ET to November 30, 2021 12:00 PM ET. The resolution source for this market will be https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/tether, and if unavailable, other sources will be used.

question: Will the bipartisan infrastructure bill become law by November 4, 2021?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” If H.R.3684 has “Become Law” (according to https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3684) by November 4, 2021, at 12:00 PM ET, and “No” otherwise. Credible news reports will be sufficient if the primary source is not updated by the resolution time.

question: Will the floor price of CryptoPunks be above 100 ETH on November 1?
description: This is a market on whether CryptoPunks will maintain a price floor over 100 ETH on November 1, 2021, at 12:00 PM ET. This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there are no CryptoPunks (on https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks/forsale#) listed for 100 ETH or lower, and “No” otherwise. Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market (as verified by the transaction hash time).

question: Will an ENS domain sell for more than 1.55m by October 31st?
description: This market will resolve “Yes” if an Ethereum Name Service (ENS) domain sells for greater than $1,550,000 after the market creation date, October 14, 2021, and before the market resolution date, October 31, 2021 12:00 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” Credible news reports may be used as secondary sources in addition to the sources listed below.

description: This market will resolve to “Red Sox” if the Boston Red Sox win their MLB American League Championship Series. If the Astros win, it will resolve to “Astros.” The ALCS is scheduled to be held from October 15 to October 23, 2021. question: What will the price of $SOL be on November 1, 2021?
description:
This is a scalar market on what the price of $SOL will be on November 1, 2021, at 12:00 PM ET. The lower bound for this market is $100, and the upper bound is $200. The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana). This market will resolve on the “C” (i.e. the closing price) listed for the candle titled “Mon 1 November 2021, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET. To allow for updates, this market will resolve on the number listed for the referenced candle at exactly 12:25:00 PM ET, on November 1, 2021. (To see the candlestick close price, click the candlestick icon, and observe the number after the “C:” when you hover over a candlestick for a given time period.) If CoinGecko is unavailable at the resolution time, another credible source will be chosen in good faith to resolve the market. 

You can use the calculator to the right (underneath the Buy modal) to calculate how each Long or Short Token price corresponds with $SOL’s price. Long and Short shares will settle proportionally to the outcome value if the final value is between these bounds, but if the final value exceeds either the upper or lower bound, the price of each Outcome Token is capped at $1 and $0.

question: Will more than 2.25 million people travel through a TSA checkpoint on Friday, October 15th?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if TSA reports a daily checkpoint throughput greater than 2,250,000 for October 15, 2021, and “No” otherwise. To resolve, data will be checked at noon ET on each day following 10/15. Throughput records may be viewed at https://www.tsa.gov/coronavirus/passenger-throughput.

question: Will Bitcoin reach an all-time high by November 15th?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the price of Bitcoin exceeds $64,804.72 as per Coingecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/bitcoin) within the market time frame, and “No” otherwise. The market time frame spans from October 14 to November 15, 2021, 11:59:59 PM ET. 

Note that even if the previous all-time high per Coingecko changes with retroactive updates, $64,804.72 will continue to be used as the previous all-time high for this market's purposes.
